owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A document that details the process of measuring a product, service, or technology and summarizing.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Life Cycle Inventory
data documentation of process
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Container for all three stages of the LCI documentation: process, modelling and validation, and administrative information

owl:Class.rdfs:label: process
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Container for all process information, including the process description and inputs/outputs.

owl:Property.rdfs:label: name
owl:Property.rdfs:comment: The name of the quantitative reference should refer to .

owl:Property.rdfs:label: Unit
owl:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the unit that helps define the quantitative reference.

owl:Property.rdfs:label: Amount
owl:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the amount that helps define the quantitative reference.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Short Technology Descriptor
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The process description should include a short description of the technology that is being assessed. Explain key factors like the processes included and the technology and equipment being utilized.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: technology picture
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the amount that helps define the quantitative reference.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: included processes
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A list of processes included in the system.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: start_date
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the first date on which data was collected.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: end_date
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the last date on which data was collected.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: time_span_description
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is a description of the time span.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: area_name
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the first date on which data was collected.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: area_description
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the last date on which data was collected.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: sites
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is a description of the time span.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: gis_reference
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is a description of the time span.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Direction
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the last date on which data was collected.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Name
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The name of the property being examined.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Unit
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the last date on which data was collected.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Mathematical Relations Value of Variable
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the last date on which data was collected.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Data Collection
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is a description of the data collection process.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Collection Date
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is the last date on which data was collected.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Criteria for Excluding Intermediate Product Flows
